ComicInfo.Summary: Everything changes after the assault of the outsiders against the survivors inside the prison facility, with many surprising deaths. The survivors are forced to flee the prison, since there's no where else to go. Lori, Judith, Billy, Hershel, Alice and Patricia are all killed by Woodbury .
